articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Gough named Yorkshire cricket director
articles.description: Former England fast bowler Darren Gough is appointed as Yorkshire's interim director of cricket until the end of the 2022 season.
articles.content:
Former England fast bowler Darren Gough has been appointed as Yorkshire's interim director of cricket until the end of the 2022 season.
